column1: Applied to all other attributes of price type
column2: Toegepast op alle andere attributen van prijs-soort

column1: If set, system remembers filters applied on search page so when customer uses search, those filtered are still applied.
column2: If set, system remembers filters applied on search page so when customer uses search, those filtered are still applied.

column1: If set, system remembers filters applied to each CMS page containing layered navigation, so when customer navigates to a CMS page to which he/she had applied filters earlier, those filtered are still applied.
column2: If set, system remembers filters applied to each CMS page containing layered navigation, so when customer navigates to a CMS page to which he/she had applied filters earlier, those filtered are still applied.

column1: If set, system remembers filters applied to each category so when customer navigates to a category to which he/she had applied filters earlier, those filtered are still applied.
column2: Als filter is toegepast, onthoud het systeem deze voor de categorie. Dus als een klant naar een categorie navigeert waar ze eerder filters had toegepast, zijn deze filters nog steeds toegepast.

column1: Not applicable to category and price filters
column2: Niet toepasbaar op categorie en prijsfilters.

column1: One or more attribute codes separated by comma (','). If not empty, specified filters are remembered globally across different categories, CMS pages and search.
column2: One or more attribute codes separated by comma (','). If not empty, specified filters are remembered globally across different categories, CMS pages and search.
